Title: Love Lasts Three Years
Writer: Frédéric Beigbeder (novel), Frédéric Beigbeder (screenplay), Eugénie Grandval (writing supervisor), Christophe Turpin (screenplay and dialogue), Christophe Turpin, Gilles Verdiani (screenplay and dialogue), Gilles Verdiani
Actors: Louise Bourgoin, Gaspard Proust, Joey Starr, Jonathan Lambert
Plot: A look at the dissolution of a marriage.
